pr_title: Fix explicit paramTypes passing for BalEnv accepting functions

timeline.message:
Fix explicit paramTypes passing for BalEnv accepting functions

Fixes #26027

timeline.bodyText: Another way we can do this is by changing validateArgumentTypes logic where we can skip first parameter if it is BalEnv class. But that has effect on normal interop function validation. This also looks good to me.
timeline.author: warunalakshitha

replies.bodyText: I also consider that approach, I waned to support the case where people have put the BalEnv to the paramTypes manually as well, this works for both.
replies.author: manuranga
